entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -36.8°C
Wind: SW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
